resources.string: Displays the number of hosts configured to be blocked by %s.
Displays the total number of ads blocked so far.
Tap to choose the blocking mechanism that works best for your device.
This blocking mechanism works on all devices, but may slightly increase battery drain or affect performance. If the Optimized blocking is not supported by your device, use this mechanism instead.
This is the new blocking mechanism with minimal impact on battery and performance, and it is supported by your device! Unless you are experiencing problems with it, this is the recommended choice.
This is the new blocking mechanism with minimal impact on battery and performance. Unfortunately, Android 5 or newer is required, so it cannot be activated on your device.
